QuestData.Title: Is This Justice?
QuestData.Description: He was a good boy, $n. Young, loving. He would have never killed any of the young druids. They were his friends! No... Not Orthus.$B$BThe General must be called to answer for this crime. I will have justice!
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Masha Cliffwalker at Cliffwalker Post in Stonetalon Mountains.
QuestData.RewardText: You saw with your own eyes, $n. General Grebo attacked us!$B$B<Masha cries.>$B$BNow what will we do? Surely the Warchief will have us all executed for treason.
